sources.title: The Mob (1951) Broderick Crawford , Richard Kiley - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: The Mob is a 1951 film noir crime thriller film directed by Robert Parrish, starring Broderick Crawford and Richard Kiley. The actor Charles Bronson makes one of his first film appearances as a longshoreman and was uncredited. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Mob_(film) Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/36oLNCR The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: Police detective Damico, outwitted by mob killer Blackie Clay, is nominally suspended; actually he goes undercover (as Tim Flynn, ex-con longshoreman) to find Clay and expose the waterfront rackets. In character, Damico throws his weight around so much that the mobsters try to get rid of him; surviving this, he begins to realize that few of those around him are what they seem.
metadata.Actors: Broderick Crawford, Betty Buehler, Richard Kiley
